problem: Bin $A$ has sixty-eight white ball and ninety-nine black balls.  Bin $B$ has one balls labeled $\$1$ and twenty-one ball labeled $\$7$.  Bin $W$ has twenty-five balls labeled $\$8$ and fifteen ball labeled $\$500$.  A game is played as follows: a ball is randomly selected from bin $A$.  If it is black, then a ball is randomly selected from bin $B$; otherwise, if the original ball is white, then a ball is randomly selected from bin $W$.  You win the amount printed on the second ball selected.  What is your expected win?
